title: Torta nera (chocolate walnut tart)
description: Crumbly pastry is filled with a mixture of chocolate, espresso, walnuts and amaretti biscuits to make this rich and decadent Italian dessert. Bellissimo!
ingredients: 200g/7oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
100g/3½oz butter, chilled, cut into small pieces
1 tbsp instant coffee powder, dissolved in a little hot water
